text: ynady almunafiqun almuminin qaylyn: 'alam nakun maeakum fi aldnya, nwdy shaeayir aldiyn mthlkm? qal almuminun lhm: bla qad kuntum maeana fi alzahr, wlknkm ahlktm 'anfusakum balnfaq walmeasy, watarabastum balnby almawt wabialmuminin aldwayr, wshkktm fi albaeth baed almwt, wkhdetkm amanykm albatlt, wbqytm ealaa dhlk hataa ja'akum almawt wkhdekm biallah alshytan
